Number System.subject: Number System
Number System.question: If n is natural, then n is:
Number System.explanation: Every natural number is a rational number $=n/1$.

Number System.subject: Number System
Number System.question: Largest integer dividing product of any four consecutive integers
Number System.explanation: Among four consecutive numbers → divisible by 4! = 24.

Number System.subject: Number System
Number System.question: Which statements correct: I product of 3 consecutive integers divisible by 6. II any integer = 3k,3k+1,3k+2
Number System.explanation: One multiple of 3 and one even always present.
